summary: Four friends are forced to enter an out of town junk-yard and throughout the night it's all hell and bullets as the local sheriff's men and the kids fight the mysterious killer that is stalking them one-by-one.
cast: Aaron Paul|Mike Erwin|Cameron Richardson|Scoot McNairy|Kelly Kruger|Justin Allen|Roger Perry|John Asher|Lisa Ann Walter|Bevin Prince|Chris Mastro|Matt Barr|Travis Aaron Wade|Jordan Yale Levine|Ruthanne Gibson|Ariel Monica Putman|Joyce Bulifant|Lars Van Wells|Jake Frigerio|Ceno Frigerio|Gian Frigerio|Erin Michele Soto
director: Director: John Asher (as John Mallory Asher)
title: Wreckage
